mapper.select: select device.id,device.name as name,device.number,device_type.name as deviceType,storehouse.name as storehouse,contract.name as contract,device.price,device.createTime,supplier.name as supplierName, device.produceTime,device.price,device.status,batch.number as batchNumber from device,device_type,storehouse,contract,batch,supplier where device.typeId=device_type.id and device.storehouseId=storehouse.id and device.contractId=contract.id and device.batchId=batch.id and device.supplierId=supplier.id and device.appId=#{appId}

select device.id,device.name as name,device.number,device.address,device_type.name as deviceType,storehouse.name as storehouse,contract.name as contract,device.price,device.createTime,supplier.name as supplierName, device.produceTime,device.price,device.status,device.lng,device.lat,batch.number as batchNumber from device,device_type,storehouse,contract,batch,supplier where device_type.mainDevice=1 and device.typeId=device_type.id and device.storehouseId=storehouse.id and device.contractId=contract.id and device.batchId=batch.id and device.supplierId=supplier.id and device.appId=#{appId}
